text: Kern Carson (January 29, 1941 – March 2, 2002) was an American football halfback. He played for the San Diego Chargers and New York Jets in 1965 and for the Toronto Argonauts in 1966. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2002 deaths Category:People from Hope, Arkansas Category:Players of American football from Arkansas Category:American football halfbacks Category:San Diego State Aztecs football players Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:New York Jets players Category:American players of Canadian football Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:Toronto Argonauts players
title: Kern Carson
